Method Detail

io_put

void io_put(int pin,
            int value)
Turn pin to off/on. Acknowledge is false.

Parameters:
pin - the pin you would like to control
value - 0, 1 to set the specific pin to on/off
See Also:
HWOperations

io_put

void io_put(int pin,
            int value,
            boolean acknowledge)
Turn pin to off/on

Parameters:
pin - the pin you would like to control
value - 0, 1 to set the specific pin to on/off
acknowledge - if you want the acknowledge
See Also:
HWOperations
